com.espertech.esper.client
Interface EPServiceStateListener

public interface EPServiceStateListener

A listener interface for callbacks regarding EPServiceProvider state changes.

Method Summary
 void onEPServiceDestroyRequested(EPServiceProvider serviceProvider)
          Invoked before an EPServiceProvider is destroyed.
 void onEPServiceInitialized(EPServiceProvider serviceProvider)
          Invoked after an existing EPServiceProvider is initialized upon completion of a call to initialize.
 

Method Detail

onEPServiceDestroyRequested

void onEPServiceDestroyRequested(EPServiceProvider serviceProvider)
Invoked before an EPServiceProvider is destroyed.

Parameters:
serviceProvider - service provider to be destroyed

onEPServiceInitialized

void onEPServiceInitialized(EPServiceProvider serviceProvider)
Invoked after an existing EPServiceProvider is initialized upon completion of a call to initialize.

Parameters:
serviceProvider - service provider that has been successfully initialized
